# Load Libraries
```{r, echo=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
library(stringr)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
# source("")
```

# Load DataSets
```{r}
df <- read_csv("")
```

```{r}
datatable(
  data = df[1:50, ],
  options = list(pageLength = 10, 
                 autoWidth = TRUE,
                 scrollX = TRUE,
                 columnDefs = list(
                   list(width = '175px',
                        targets = seq(1, dim(df)[2])))),
  class = 'cell-border stripe'
  )
```
